effect_entries.effect: Teaches Explosion to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Explosion to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
大きな　爆発で　自分の　周りに
いるものを　攻撃する。
使ったあとに　ひんしに　なる。

The user attacks everything around it
by causing a tremendous explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.

Chi la usa esplode e infligge danni agli altri
Pokémon in campo, ma poi va KO.

Ataca al objetivo con cuchillas o garras que se
cruzan a modo de tijera.

Diese besondere Attacke verletzt Pokémon
in der Nähe des Anwenders, der dabei jedoch
kampfunfähig wird.

Le lanceur explose et inflige des dégâts à tous
les Pokémon autour de lui. Met K.O. le lanceur.

큰 폭발을 일으켜서 자신의
주위에 있는 포켓몬을 공격한다.
사용한 뒤 기절한다.

おおきな　ばくはつで　じぶんの
まわりに　いるものを　こうげきする。
つかったあと　ひんしに　なる。

The user explodes to inflict damage on
those around it.
The user faints upon using this move.

The user explodes to inflict damage on
those around it.
The user faints upon using this move.

Le lanceur explose et inflige des
dégâts à tous les Pokémon autour
de lui. Met K.O. le lanceur.

The user explodes to inflict damage on
all Pokémon in battle. The user faints
upon using this move.

The user explodes to inflict damage on
all Pokémon in battle. The user faints
upon using this move.

The user explodes to inflict damage on
all Pokémon in battle. The user faints
upon using this move.
